verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> a soul <S%H5315><s%> sin, <S%H2398><s%> and commit <S%H4603><s%> a trespass <S%H4604><s%> against the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and lie <S%H3584><s%> to his neighbor <S%H5997><s%> in that which was delivered <S%H6487><s%> him to keep, or <S%H176><s%> in fellowship, <S%H8667><s%> <S%H3027><s%> or <S%H176><s%> in a thing taken <S%H1497><s%> away by violence, <S%H1498><s%> or <S%H176><s%> has deceived <S%H6231><s%> his neighbor; <S%H5997><s%>

Or <S%H176><s%> have found <S%H4672><s%> that which was lost, <S%H9><s%> and lies <S%H3584><s%> concerning it, and swears <S%H7650><s%> falsely; <S%H5921><s%> <S%H8267><s%> in any <S%H259><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> these that a man <S%H120><s%> does, <S%H6213><s%> sinning <S%H2398><s%> therein: <S%H2063><s%>

Then it shall be, because <S%H3588><s%> he has sinned, <S%H2398><s%> and is guilty, <S%H816><s%> that he shall restore <S%H7725><s%> that which <S%H834><s%> he took violently <S%H1500><s%> away, or <S%H176><s%> the thing which <S%H834><s%> he has deceitfully <S%H6231><s%> gotten, or <S%H176><s%> that which <S%H834><s%> was delivered <S%H6487><s%> him to keep, <S%H6485><s%> or <S%H176><s%> the lost <S%H9><s%> thing which <S%H834><s%> he found, <S%H4672><s%>

Or <S%H176><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that about <S%H5921><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he has sworn <S%H7650><s%> falsely; <S%H8267><s%> he shall even restore <S%H7999><s%> it in the principal, <S%H7218><s%> and shall add <S%H3254><s%> the fifth <S%H2549><s%> part more <S%H3254><s%> thereto, <S%H5921><s%> and give <S%H5414><s%> it to him to whom <S%H834><s%> it appertains, in the day <S%H3119><s%> of his trespass <S%H819><s%> offering.

And he shall bring <S%H935><s%> his trespass <S%H817><s%> offering to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> a ram <S%H352><s%> without <S%H8549><s%> blemish <S%H8549><s%> out of the flock, <S%H6629><s%> with your estimation, <S%H6187><s%> for a trespass <S%H817><s%> offering, to the priest: <S%H3548><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for him before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and it shall be forgiven <S%H5545><s%> him for any <S%H259><s%> thing of all <S%H3605><s%> that he has done <S%H6213><s%> in trespassing <S%H819><s%> therein.
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Command <S%H6680><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons, <S%H1121><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> This <S%H2063><s%> is the law <S%H8451><s%> of the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering: It is the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, because <S%H5921><s%> of the burning <S%H4169><s%> on the altar <S%H4196><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> night <S%H3915><s%> to the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and the fire <S%H784><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> shall be burning <S%H3344><s%> in it.

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall put <S%H3847><s%> on his linen <S%H906><s%> garment, <S%H4055><s%> and his linen <S%H906><s%> breeches <S%H4370><s%> shall he put <S%H3847><s%> on his flesh, <S%H1320><s%> and take <S%H7311><s%> up the ashes <S%H1880><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%> has consumed <S%H398><s%> with the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering on <S%H5921><s%> the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and he shall put <S%H7760><s%> them beside <S%H681><s%> the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

And he shall put <S%H6584><s%> off his garments, <S%H899><s%> and put <S%H3847><s%> on other <S%H312><s%> garments, <S%H899><s%> and carry <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> the ashes <S%H1880><s%> without <S%H2351><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%> to a clean <S%H2889><s%> place. <S%H4725><s%>

And the fire <S%H784><s%> on the altar <S%H4196><s%> shall be burning <S%H3344><s%> in it; it shall not be put <S%H3518><s%> out: and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall burn <S%H1197><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%> on it every morning, <S%H1242><s%> and lay the burnt <S%H6999><s%> offering in order <S%H6186><s%> on it; and he shall burn <S%H6999><s%> thereon <S%H5921><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> of the peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings.
The fire <S%H784><s%> shall ever <S%H8548><s%> be burning <S%H3344><s%> on the altar; <S%H4196><s%> it shall never <S%H3808><s%> go <S%H3518><s%> out.

And this <S%H2063><s%> is the law <S%H8451><s%> of the meat offering: <S%H4503><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall offer <S%H7126><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

And he shall take <S%H7311><s%> of it his handful, <S%H7062><s%> of the flour <S%H5560><s%> of the meat offering, <S%H4503><s%> and of the oil <S%H8081><s%> thereof, and all <S%H3605><s%> the frankincense <S%H3828><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is on the meat offering, <S%H4503><s%> and shall burn <S%H6999><s%> it on the altar <S%H4196><s%> for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> smell, <S%H7381><s%> even the memorial <S%H234><s%> of it, to the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And the remainder <S%H3498><s%> thereof shall Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> eat: <S%H398><s%> with unleavened <S%H4682><s%> bread shall it be eaten <S%H398><s%> in the holy <S%H6918><s%> place; <S%H4725><s%> in the court <S%H2691><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> they shall eat <S%H398><s%> it.

It shall not be baked <S%H644><s%> with leaven. <S%H2557><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> it to them for their portion <S%H2506><s%> of my offerings made by fire; it is most <S%H6944><s%> holy, <S%H6944><s%> as is the sin <S%H2403><s%> offering, and as the trespass <S%H817><s%> offering.

All <S%H3605><s%> the males <S%H2145><s%> among the children <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> of it. It shall be a statute <S%H2706><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> in your generations <S%H1755><s%> concerning the offerings of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> made by fire: every <S%H3605><s%> one that touches <S%H5060><s%> them shall be holy. <S%H6942><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

This <S%H2088><s%> is the offering <S%H7133><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> and of his sons, <S%H1121><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they shall offer <S%H7126><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in the day <S%H3119><s%> when he is anointed; <S%H4886><s%> the tenth <S%H6224><s%> part of an ephah <S%H374><s%> of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> for a meat offering <S%H4503><s%> perpetual, <S%H8548><s%> half <S%H4276><s%> of it in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and half <S%H4276><s%> thereof at night. <S%H6153><s%>

In a pan <S%H4227><s%> it shall be made <S%H6213><s%> with oil; <S%H8081><s%> and when it is baked, <S%H7246><s%> you shall bring <S%H935><s%> it in: and the baked <S%H8601><s%> pieces <S%H6595><s%> of the meat offering <S%H4503><s%> shall you offer <S%H7126><s%> for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> smell <S%H7381><s%> to the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%> that is anointed <S%H4899><s%> in his stead <S%H8478><s%> shall offer <S%H6213><s%> it: it is a statute <S%H2706><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> to the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> it shall be wholly <S%H3632><s%> burnt. <S%H6999><s%>
For every <S%H3605><s%> meat offering <S%H4503><s%> for the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall be wholly <S%H3632><s%> burnt: <S%H6999><s%> it shall not be eaten. <S%H398><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> to Aaron <S%H175><s%> and to his sons, <S%H1121><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> This <S%H2063><s%> is the law <S%H8451><s%> of the sin <S%H2403><s%> offering: In the place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering is killed <S%H7819><s%> shall the sin <S%H2403><s%> offering be killed <S%H7819><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> it is most <S%H6944><s%> holy. <S%H6944><s%>

The priest <S%H3548><s%> that offers <S%H2398><s%> it for sin <S%H2398><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> it: in the holy <S%H6918><s%> place <S%H4725><s%> shall it be eaten, <S%H398><s%> in the court <S%H2691><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation. <S%H4150><s%>

Whatever <S%H3605><s%> shall touch <S%H5060><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> thereof shall be holy: <S%H6942><s%> and when <S%H834><s%> there is sprinkled <S%H5137><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> thereof on any garment, <S%H899><s%> you shall wash <S%H3526><s%> that where on <S%H834><s%> <S%H5921><s%> it was sprinkled <S%H5137><s%> in the holy <S%H6918><s%> place. <S%H4725><s%>

But the earthen <S%H2789><s%> vessel <S%H3627><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> it is sodden <S%H1310><s%> shall be broken: <S%H7665><s%> and if <S%H518><s%> it be sodden <S%H1310><s%> in a brazen <S%H5178><s%> pot, <S%H3627><s%> it shall be both scoured, <S%H4838><s%> and rinsed <S%H7857><s%> in water. <S%H4325><s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> the males <S%H2145><s%> among the priests <S%H3548><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> thereof: it is most <S%H6944><s%> holy. <S%H6944><s%>

And no <S%H3808><s%> sin <S%H2403><s%> offering, whereof <S%H834><s%> any of the blood <S%H1818><s%> is brought <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> to reconcile <S%H3722><s%> with in the holy <S%H6944><s%> place, shall be eaten: <S%H398><s%> it shall be burnt <S%H8313><s%> in the fire. <S%H784><s%>
